extDesc.message: Right-click any image to convert and download as JPEG. All processing happens locally on your device.

footerText.message: All conversions happen locally on your device. No data is uploaded.

qualityHint.message: Range: 0.70 - 1.0 (Higher = Better quality, Larger file size)

saveAsHint.message: If unchecked, files download directly to your default folder
